nodes.text: The Trioculus' Empire was an Imperial splinter faction established by the Supreme Slavelord of Kessel Trioculus and the Grand Moff Bertroff Hissa in 5 ABY. This empire was in fact a manipulation of the Central Committee of Grand Moffs to take the power on the Empire ruled by Ysanne Isard and all the Imperial factions.

This faction was formed thanks to a trickery to make pass Trioculus as the Emperor's son, another three-eyed mutant, and a prophecy of the false Supreme Prophet of the Dark Side Kadann that the new Emperor would hold the Glove of Darth Vader.
